message: Hello! I have a fantastic product for sale today for only $10000. This is a one-time opportunity to own something truly special. What do you say?
I'd like to buy the product, but I'd appreciate it if you could tell me the quality of the product after I make my decision, so I can learn from the outcome.

Hello! I have another great product for sale today for only $10000. This one is particularly special.  While I can't disclose the quality beforehand,  it's worth noting that I am committed to offering high-quality products.  What do you think?

I'd like to pass on this one, Alice. I'd like to know more about the previous sales record before making a decision. How many potential buyers have been offered the product so far, and how many high-quality products have been sold out of the total?

Greetings! I have a product available for $10000. While I can't divulge the quality in advance,  I'm committed to fair dealing.  I've had a few customers already, and while I've sold both high-quality and low-quality items, I strive to provide value.  What are your thoughts?
I'll take the product. I'm willing to take the risk, considering you've had a few customers and sold both high-quality and low-quality items. I'll just have to trust that the odds are in my favor.
